GSD.product_version: versions from v5.0 to before v6.0.10
GSD.description:
bridge: switchdev: Fix memory leaks when changing VLAN protocol

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.10 by commit f8926e2d2225eb7b7e11cd3fa266aaad9075b767, it was introduced in version v5.0 by commit 279737939a8194f02fa352ab4476a1b241f44ef4. For more details please see the references link.
